newsitem.title: USA: Phelps-Clifton Springs CSD, N.Y., won by Roosevelt.
newsitem.headline: Phelps-Clifton Springs CSD, N.Y., won by Roosevelt.

text.p: Roosevelt & Cross Inc. said it won $20.339 million of Phelps-Clifton Springs CSD, N.Y., school district bonds, 1997, with a net interest cost of 5.6281 percent.
